title: Strengthening Practitioner Competencies for Public Health Improvement: Simulation-Based Interprofessional Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational public health concepts and practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulates/VR-recreates public health agency work environments, including team-based projects and interdisciplinary collaboration with experts from other fields

learning_goals: Learners can develop project proposals for solving public health issues based on real-world case studies
Learners establish collaboration strategies with diverse stakeholders (medical staff, journalists, community members) using VR simulations
Learners critically evaluate and propose improvements for public health interventions by applying evidence-based approaches

resources: Collaboration Tools (Online Whiteboard, Document Sharing Platform)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
